Question: Shenzhen KunHong Electronics Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen KunHong Electronics Co., Ltd

Product: Consumer Electronics

- Specializes in consumer electronic products such as audio, gaming, lighting, and smart home series
- Offers private ODM products and serves world-famous brands
- Utilizes ISO quality management system and meets third-party human rights and social responsibility inspection requirements
- Has professional manufacturing capability in both China and Southeast Asia
- Main markets are in North America, Europe, Australia, and Japan
- China factory has two buildings over 16,000 square meters and over 600 workers in Shenzhen
- Thailand factory has one building about 3,000 square meters and around 200 workers nearby Bangkok
- Committed to providing a one-stop solution from product design, mass production, sales, and shipping to global clients
Summary_cn:
深圳市昆宏电子有限公司

产品：消费电子产品

- 专注于音频、游戏、照明和智能家居系列等消费电子产品
- 提供私人ODM产品并为世界知名品牌提供服务
- 采用ISO质量管理体系，满足第三方人权和社会责任检验要求
- 在中国和东南亚都拥有专业的制造能力
- 主要市场在北美、欧洲、澳大利亚和日本
- 中国工厂在深圳拥有两栋超过16,000平方米的建筑和600多名员工
- 泰国工厂在曼谷附近拥有一栋约3,000平方米的建筑和约200名员工
- 致力于为全球客户提供从产品设计、批量生产、销售和运输的一站式解决方案
